sentences.en: A mole or blemish present on the skin from birth; a nevus.
sentences.cn: 胎记出生时皮肤上就有的痣或斑点; 痣.

sentences.en: Birthmark: Unusual mark or Blemish on the skin at Birth.
sentences.cn: 胎记: 出生时,皮肤上不寻常的一种瘢或疤.

sentences.en: But she -- was she herself without blemish?
sentences.cn: 可是她呢 —— 难道她自己就无可指责 吗 ?

sentences.en: Every piece is closely scrutinised, and if there is the slightest blemish on it, it is rejected.
sentences.cn: 每一件物品都经过严格检查，稍有瑕疵就会被退回。

sentences.en: Every piece is closely scrutinized, and if there is the slightest blemish on it, it is rejected.
sentences.cn: 每一件都经过仔细检查，如果上面有哪怕最微小的瑕疵，都会被拒绝。

sentences.en: He was pilloried, but she escaped without blemish.
sentences.cn: 他受到公众的批评, 她却名声未损地得以逃脱.

sentences.en: He wasn't about to blemish that pristine record.
sentences.cn: 他本不想去玷污那清白的过去。

sentences.en: It is the only blemish on his record.
sentences.cn: 这是他历史上唯一的污点.

sentences.en: One , active and metric mode and its blemish ( one ) about metric attribute.
sentences.cn: 现行计量模式及其缺陷 ( 一 ) 关于计量属性.

sentences.en: One bad deed can blemish a good reputation.
sentences.cn: 一次不良的行为可损害好的名声.

sentences.en: Pigment group and expanding capillary in skin mainly account for facial blemish.
sentences.cn: 皮肤中的色素团和扩张的毛细血管是皮肤瑕疵的主要组成部分.

sentences.en: That mole is a blemish on his face.
sentences.cn: 那个黑痣是他脸上的缺点.

sentences.en: The accident was a blemish in an otherwise perfect evening.
sentences.cn: 那个意外是那天晚上唯一美中不足的地方.

sentences.en: The police say the suspect has a slight blemish on his left cheek.
sentences.cn: 警方说嫌犯的左颊上有一小块疤痕.

sentences.en: The slightest blemish can reduce market value.
sentences.cn: 只要有一点最小的损害都会降低市场价值.

sentences.en: This blemish was removed by Felix Klem.

trans.tran_en: a small mark, especially a mark on someone’s skin or on the surface of an object, that spoils its appearance
to spoil the beauty or appearance of something, so that it is not perfect

trans.tran_cn: 有损…的完美，玷污，损害，弄脏
